Class HarmonicBondPotentialCalculator

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.samples.harmonicBonds.HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
de.gnwi.jdpdsp.samples.harmonicBonds.HarmonicBondPotentialCalculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalculator, IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
public class HarmonicBondPotentialCalculator extends HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
Harmonic bond potential calculator NOTE: NO particle related array is changed.

  • Method Details

    • calculateBondProperty

      protected void calculateBondProperty(int aParticleIndex_i, int aParticleIndex_j, float aRij_x, float aRij_y, float aRij_z, float aBondLength, float aForceConstant, HarmonicBond.HarmonicBondBehaviour aHarmonicBondBehaviour, AdderGroup anAdderGroup, Parameters aParameters)
      Bond force calculation NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation guarantees for aDoubleAdder being unique in current working thread thus NO thread-safe implementation of float adder is necessary.
      Specified by:
      calculateBondProperty in class HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
      Parameters:
      aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i
      aParticleIndex_j - Index of particle j
      aRij_x - x[aParticleIndex_i] - x[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_y - y[aParticleIndex_i] - y[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
      aBondLength - Bond length
      aForceConstant - Force constant
      aHarmonicBondBehaviour - Behaviour of harmonic bond
      anAdderGroup - Adder group (NOTE: NOT thread-safe)
      aParameters - Parameters (may be null)
